mapper.sql: COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO_ID as commodityGiftInfoId, CODE as code, DONATOR_GIFT_ACCOUNT_ID as donatorGiftAccountId, COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID as commodityContractId, GREETING as greeting, TYPE as type, SPECIFIED_DONEE_USER_ID as specifiedDoneeUserId, DONEE_QUOTA as doneeQuota, DONEE_SURPLUS as doneeSurplus, COMMODITY_TOTAL_QUANTITY as commodityTotalQuantity, COMMODITY_SURPLUS_QUANTITY as commoditySurplusQuantity, CREATE_TIME as createTime, EXPIRED_TIME as expiredTime, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS as commodityFlowRecordIds, REFUNDED as refunded, REFUND_FLOW_RECORD_ID as refundFlowRecordId, DONEE_USER_IDS as doneeUserIds
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO (CODE, DONATOR_GIFT_ACCOUNT_ID, COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID, GREETING, TYPE, SPECIFIED_DONEE_USER_ID, DONEE_QUOTA, DONEE_SURPLUS, COMMODITY_TOTAL_QUANTITY, COMMODITY_SURPLUS_QUANTITY, CREATE_TIME, EXPIRED_TIME, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS, REFUNDED, REFUND_FLOW_RECORD_ID, DONEE_USER_IDS ) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{donatorGiftAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{greeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifiedDoneeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doneeQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doneeSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodityTotalQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commoditySurplusQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refunded,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundFlowRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneeUserIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO
COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO_ID = #{record.commodityGiftInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DONATOR_GIFT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{record.donatorGiftAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{record.commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GREETING = #{record.greeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECIFIED_DONEE_USER_ID = #{record.specifiedDoneeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DONEE_QUOTA = #{record.doneeQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DONEE_SURPLUS = #{record.doneeSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMMODITY_TOTAL_QUANTITY = #{record.commodityTotalQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMODITY_SURPLUS_QUANTITY = #{record.commoditySurplusQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRED_TIME = #{record.expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{record.commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFUNDED = #{record.refunded,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFUND_FLOW_RECORD_ID = #{record.refundFlowRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DONEE_USER_IDS = #{record.doneeUserIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO set COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO_ID = #{record.commodityGiftInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONATOR_GIFT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{record.donatorGiftAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{record.commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GREETING = #{record.greeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIFIED_DONEE_USER_ID = #{record.specifiedDoneeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DONEE_QUOTA = #{record.doneeQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DONEE_SURPLUS = #{record.doneeSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMODITY_TOTAL_QUANTITY = #{record.commodityTotalQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMODITY_SURPLUS_QUANTITY = #{record.commoditySurplusQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRED_TIME = #{record.expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{record.commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUNDED = #{record.refunded,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUND_FLOW_RECORD_ID = #{record.refundFlowRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONEE_USER_IDS = #{record.doneeUserIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DONATOR_GIFT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{donatorGiftAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GREETING = #{greeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECIFIED_DONEE_USER_ID = #{specifiedDoneeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DONEE_QUOTA = #{doneeQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DONEE_SURPLUS = #{doneeSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMMODITY_TOTAL_QUANTITY = #{commodityTotalQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMODITY_SURPLUS_QUANTITY = #{commoditySurplusQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRED_TIME = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFUNDED = #{refunded,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO_ID = #{commodityGiftInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONATOR_GIFT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{donatorGiftAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GREETING = #{greeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIFIED_DONEE_USER_ID = #{specifiedDoneeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DONEE_QUOTA = #{doneeQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DONEE_SURPLUS = #{doneeSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMODITY_TOTAL_QUANTITY = #{commodityTotalQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMODITY_SURPLUS_QUANTITY = #{commoditySurplusQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRED_TIME = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUNDED = #{refunded,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUND_FLOW_RECORD_ID = #{refundFlowRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONEE_USER_IDS = #{doneeUserIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COMMODITY_GIFT_INFO_ID = #{commodityGiftInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
